title: [Minecraft.net | MINECRAFT BUILDS]国家宫
author: 封徵
txt_content:
MINECRAFT BUILDS
National Palace
国家宫

Produced by DiangelloCreates
建筑作者：DiangelloCreates

Nova Barlow 诺瓦·巴洛


This detailed building by DiangelloCreates draws inspiration from the Dominican Republic’s real-life National Palace. A long time Minecraft community builder, he has created a number of structures over the years to share with the community, including large mythically-inspired sculptures and other real-world builds. Thanks for sharing this creation with us.
我们现在所看到的这座由 DiangelloCreates 所建造的宫殿的灵感来源于真实存在于多米尼加共和国的国家宫。他在Minecraft社区中可谓是一名老牌建筑师了，迄今为止，他已经建造了数量庞大的诸如神话建筑、雕像与现实世界中的建筑等的建筑，并在社区里分享他的建筑成果。在此也感谢他这一次也是又一次为我们带来的如此棒的建筑！
Want to share your own works? Drop us a note along with a screenshot to FeatureMe@minecraft.net to share them with us and you might find your work here.
想要向大家分享你自己的建筑成果吗？发送邮件到 FeatureMe@minecraft.net 并附上截图和几句简短的建筑介绍，或许不日，你就能在这里看到你的建筑了！



【封徵 译自官网 2020 年 04 月 30 日发布的 National Palace；原作者 Nova Barlow】
【本文排版借助了：SPX】
